description: Main entry point of a Flutter application that initializes environment variables, sets up providers for state management, and builds the root widget of the app.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application that sets up multi-provider state management and conditionally navigates based on authentication state.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, and runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, wrapping the MaterialApp with providers and managing initial routes based on authentication status.
